byline.contributor: Stephanie Clifford, Eli Rosenberg and Liam Stack contributed reporting.
byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

abstract: Fifteen-year-old Destiny Garcia is arrested and charged with murder after her mother Rosie Sanchez and her mother's boyfriend Anderson Nunez are found killed in Brooklyn apartment; Sanchez is found with multiple gunshot wounds and Nunez is found with both gunshot and stab wounds; authorities says Garcia made videotaped confession.
lead_paragraph: Destiny Garcia was charged with murder in the killings of the Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, couple, whose bodies were found Sunday night.

headline.main: Girl, 15, Is Arrested in Deaths of Mother and Her Boyfriend
headline.print_headline: Girl, 15, Is Arrested After Officers Find Mother and Her Partner Dead

snippet: Destiny Garcia was charged with murder in the killings of the Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, couple, whose bodies were found Sunday night.
